annotations.description: Today's game was very poor. There weren't many thrilling moments. AS Roma had more of the game and were superior. Their manager will certainly be the happier of the two managers. In terms of strategy, the hosts were waiting for the right moment to win the ball and launch a counter attack. The visiting side adopted a possession style of football.

Lucas Ocampos (Genoa) fashions a shot from the edge of the box after receiving an accurate pass. Wojciech Szczesny makes a stunning save to stop the effort from flying into the top right corner. Genoa earn a corner.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: We will have 4 min. of added time.
That's a well taken pass by Daniele De Rossi (AS Roma). He unleashes a strike from the edge of the box, but blazes it high over the bar.

annotations.description: Lucas Ocampos (Genoa) is given a fully deserved yellow card.
Mauricio Pinilla (Genoa) stands over the resultant free kick from mid range, but his shot goes just over the crossbar. It could have been a fantastic goal!

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Luciano Spalletti prepares a substitution. Diego Perotti is replaced by Stephan El Shaarawy (AS Roma).

annotations.description: We are about to witness a substitution. Mauricio Pinilla (Genoa) is replacing Darko Lazovic.
A precise cross towards the penalty spot was latched onto by Giovanni Simeone (Genoa). He outjumped the defence and produced a decent header which went a whisker wide of the left post.
Lucas Ocampos (Genoa) attempts to find the head of one of his teammates with a promising cross into the box, but a defender outjumps the attackers and averts the threat.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The corner from Bruno Peres (AS Roma) is intercepted by the defence.

Edin Dzeko (AS Roma) makes a yard for himself inside the box after an accurate pass and takes a shot that goes just over the crossbar.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Kevin Strootman (AS Roma) was quite harsh and Nicola Rizzoli didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.
Giovanni Simeone (Genoa) is flagged for offside.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Bruno Peres (AS Roma) swings in a dangerous cross from the resulting corner kick, but none of his teammates manage to outjump the defence.

Nice individual effort by Edin Dzeko (AS Roma). He gets all the way through to the keeper and hits a low drive to the bottom right corner, but Eugenio Lamanna does a good job to anticipate the direction of the ball and keeps it out. The ball is out of play. A goal scoring opportunity from a corner for AS Roma.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: It's time for a substitution. Edenilson (Genoa) comes on in place of Nikola Ninkovic.
Radja Nainggolan (AS Roma) gets to the rebound outside the box and doesn't hesitate to shoot on goal. It was a promising attempt, but one of the defending players got in the way and blocked it.
A cross from Darko Lazovic (Genoa) fails to reach the box as the defence clears the ball away to safety.
Eugenio Lamanna pulls off a great save to block a header from Radja Nainggolan (AS Roma) after a nice lofted cross.
Bruno Peres (AS Roma) plays in a hopeful cross, but it doesn't find its way to any of the attacking players. The ball goes out of play and Genoa will have a goal kick.
Darko Lazovic (Genoa) receives a precise pass on the edge of the box and bends his effort inches wide of the left post.
Bruno Peres (AS Roma) sends a lofted cross into the penalty area. Unfortunately for him, the opponent's defence deals with his cross comfortably and intercepts it.
Diego Laxalt (Genoa) makes a driving run into the box but he cannot work any space for a shot. The ball goes out of play and AS Roma will have a goal kick.

Bruno Peres (AS Roma) whips the ball into the penalty area, but one of the defenders is alert and spanks it away. It will be a corner kick for AS Roma.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The players are back out on the pitch following the half time break and the second half is about to start.

Today's clash hasn't been that attractive up to now, but it hasn't been a total borefest. There have been a few nice movements for both sides. AS Roma have arguably been the better of the two sides in the first half. The home side is creating their opportunities using lightning fast counter attacks. The tactic of the away side is slow build up play.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: There will be nothing more to see in the first half. The whistle blowing of Nicola Rizzoli has ended it.
Edin Dzeko (AS Roma) attempts to scoop the ball into the box over the defence, but one of the defending players makes a timely intervention.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: Fourth official shows 2 min. of added time.
Great teamplay by AS Roma as they control the ball with a lot of short passes. Patience is the key if they want to find a gap in the defence to score.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Nicola Rizzoli shows a yellow card to Antonio Rudiger (AS Roma) for his blatant foul.

annotations.label: soccer-ball-own
annotations.description: An unfortunate own goal is conceded by Armando Izzo (Genoa), who attempted to block the ball after a cross, but instead he sends it inside the bottom left corner of his own goal.
Giovanni Simeone receives a sweet pass inside the box from Darko Lazovic (Genoa), but one of the defenders is first to the ball and makes an interception.
Genoa keep the ball and are displaying some tiki taka style passing at the moment.
Diego Perotti (AS Roma) escapes his marker to connect with a cross and heads towards the right side of the goal, but the keeper pulls off an excellent save to deny him.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Bruno Peres (AS Roma) sends the corner into the box, but Eugenio Lamanna intercepts it and averts the threat.
Diego Perotti (AS Roma) produces a dangerous low pass into the penalty area, but the defence manage to cut it out. The ball is out of play and AS Roma manage to earn a corner.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Isaac Cofie (Genoa) is booked after bringing down an opponent. Nicola Rizzoli had an easy decision to make.
Radja Nainggolan (AS Roma) controls a nice low pass and shoots from just outside the box, but it's a poor effort that flies into the stands. Wasted opportunity!

A neat pass is well received by Lucas Ocampos (Genoa), who is lurking on the edge of the box and strikes the ball towards the right post, but the goalkeeper makes an incredible diving save to block his shot.
Diego Laxalt (Genoa) crosses into the box from near the side line, but he doesn't connect as he wanted and it's cleared by the well organized defence.

Edin Dzeko (AS Roma) receives a low pass just outside the box and unleashes a fine strike towards the roof of the net. Eugenio Lamanna pulls off a reflexive save to block his effort. Nice goalkeeping skill, indeed.
Nikola Ninkovic (Genoa) sends over a free kick from long range but the defence is alert.
Nicola Rizzoli couldn't ignore the rough tackle by Antonio Rudiger (AS Roma) and blew his whistle. That's a free kick to Genoa.
Darko Lazovic (Genoa) sends a teasing cross into the area, but Wojciech Szczesny intercepts the ball.
The referee blows his whistle, a clear handball by Lucas Ocampos (Genoa).
Emerson (AS Roma) latches on to a precise pass and finds himself one on one with the keeper. He fires a low shot towards the left side of the net, but Eugenio Lamanna leaps like a salmon to deny him.
Close! Radja Nainggolan (AS Roma) picks up the ball in space and from inside the penalty area sends a shot inches wide of the right post. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for Genoa.
Giovanni Simeone (Genoa) finds himself beyond the last defender but the linesman raises his flag for offside.
